channel.title: Remove fog and zoom in/out?
channel.description:
Solved. :)
Fog: How do I either: 1. delete the fog completely 2. make an option in the tools that lets the player disable it if they choose
Zoom In/Out 1. How to I make it so I can zoom in and out on RSCD?
Thanks guys

item.title: Remove fog and zoom in/out?
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:11, topic:320075”][quote author=Crooks link=topic=416532.msg3137712#msg3137712 date=1267206147]

i edited this to false does nothing?

You must also change the gamecamera…
gameCamera.zoom1 = 99999;
gameCamera.zoom2 = 99999;
gameCamera.zoom3 = 1;
gameCamera.zoom4 = 99999;
Etc.
[/quote]

Or just do it like this, so you’re not wasting system resources:

if (!super.keyF1Toggle) { gameCamera.zoom1 = 2400 + (this.cameraHeight * 2); gameCamera.zoom2 = 2400 + (this.cameraHeight * 2); gameCamera.zoom3 = 1; gameCamera.zoom4 = 2300 + (this.cameraHeight * 2); } else { gameCamera.zoom1 = 2200 + (this.cameraHeight * 2); gameCamera.zoom2 = 2200 + (this.cameraHeight * 2); gameCamera.zoom3 = 1; gameCamera.zoom4 = 2100 + (this.cameraHeight * 2); }
The difference is about 10% CPU usage on an AMD Athlon x4 620 @ 2.60GHz…

Also, the key values for up and down arrows are 1004 and 1005.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Remove fog and zoom in/out?
item.dc:creator: @A_Gh0st A Gh0st
item.description:
@A_Gh0st wrote:

Vortex. Thank you for telling me where to look.

gameCamera.zoom1 = 3000; gameCamera.zoom2 = 3000; gameCamera.zoom3 = 1; gameCamera.zoom4 = 2800; cameraRotation = cameraAutoAngle * 32; int k5 = lastAutoCameraRotatePlayerX + screenRotationX; int l7 = lastAutoCameraRotatePlayerY + screenRotationY; gameCamera.setCamera(k5, -engineHandle.getAveragedElevation(k5, l7), l7, 912, cameraRotation * 4, 0, 2000); } else { if (configAutoCameraAngle && !zoomCamera) autoRotateCamera(); if (!super.keyF1Toggle) { gameCamera.zoom1 = 2400; gameCamera.zoom2 = 2400; gameCamera.zoom3 = 1; gameCamera.zoom4 = 2300; } else { gameCamera.zoom1 = 2200; gameCamera.zoom2 = 2200; gameCamera.zoom3 = 1; gameCamera.zoom4 = 2100; }

This is what I have for gamecamera.zoom. Unfortunately, I have no idea what I’m supposed to do with this or how to make the game zoom in/out still. Could I please get some more knowledge? Please try to be specific guys.

Read full topic

item.title: Remove fog and zoom in/out?

Instead of learning you could just rip it from rscangel client.
[/quote]

[quote author=Rodgerwilco link=topic=518387.msg3768739#msg3768739 date=1317491954]
Copy & Paste = You learn nothing.
[/quote][/quote]

I’m learning a ton bro. Sometimes I just want to complete a task without working hours and hours on it. Just spent three hours adding some stuff that would probably take you guys ten minutes because I had to figure it out LOL.

Question: When I try to open RSCA’s Mudclient file, there are a lot of random characters in it that prevent me from really being able to read the code… Examples: œ”ð½♫

What do I need to do to fix this problem?
